content: for size s and k3 for size m/l--26 27 st on needle needle 3 pick up and knit one stitch in corner and 10 12 stitches from flap side facing and knit across 6 7 st on the heel cup pm for center bottom of foot size s 17 26 17 st size m/l 20 27 20 st work one round needle 1--k to last 2 st k2tog needle 2 rib pattern as established needle 3 k2tog knit to marker decrease for gusset tube of foot round 1 knit around foot evenly knit top of foot needle 2 in ribbing pattern as established round 2 needle 1 k to last 3 st k2tog k1 needle 2 rib pattern needle 3 k1 ssk k to end of needle entwined house socks for ladies page 4 repeat rnds 1 and 2 until 9 11 st remain on needles 1 and 3 size s 44 st size m/l 49 st knit one round ribbing as established and in top of foot for size m/l only k2tog in the middle k4 rib section size s 44 st size m/l 48 st work even ribbing top of foot as established until sock measures 3 inches less than foot measurement ending at marker reposition needles so there is an equal number of stitches on top and bottom of foot with marker at center bottom of foot 22 24 needle 1 11 12 st needle 2 22 24 st needle 3 11 12 st toe decrease working in knit only no ribbing from here on round 1 needle 1 k to last 3 st k2tog k1 needle 2 k1 ssk k to last 3 st k2tog k1 needle 3 k1 ssk knit to end 40 44 st round 2 knit around work 4 more rnds of round 2 then work rnds 1 and 2 until there are 6 7 st on needles 1 and 3 continue and work round 1 only until there are 3 st on needles 1 and 3 knit to end needle 1 finishing kitchener graft toe weave in ends make right sock working cables as c4r throughout cuff entwined house socks for ladies page 5
